meanings.definition: A waterproof outer garment worn to protect against rain.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, Sarah put on her rainsuit to stay dry.
meanings.sent2: I always carry a rainsuit in my backpack in case it rains.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear a tiny rainsuit, but it was too big for her.
meanings.sent4: His smile was his rainsuit, shielding him from the downpour of criticism.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow rainsuit stood out in the sea of umbrellas.

meanings.definition: To dress in a waterproof garment to shield from rain.
meanings.sent1: We need to rainsuit up before heading out in this weather.
meanings.sent2: She always rainsuits herself before going out on her bike.
meanings.sent3: The dog loves when we rainsuit him, he thinks it's a game.
meanings.sent4: He rainsuited his emotions, not letting anyone see how he truly felt.
meanings.sent5: Before the hike, make sure to rainsuit properly to avoid getting wet.
